trans-unit.source: Represents XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok XML vagy XML-metaadatok mutató hivatkozások jelöli.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSection class conforms to the definition of the `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` element in the WS-Metadata Exchange specification and contains XML metadata or references to XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: A MetadataSection osztály megfelel-e a definícióját a `wsx:Metadata/wsx:MetadataSection` a WS-metaadatok Exchange specifikációban elem és a metaadatok XML vagy XML-metaadatok mutató hivatkozásokat tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: A MetadataSection object contains one dialect of metadata in XML form (such as a Web Services Description Language or WSDL file).
trans-unit.target: Egy MetadataSection objektum tartalmaz egy dialektus a metaadatok XML formátumban (például a Web Services Description Language vagy a WSDL-fájl).

trans-unit.source: You can add a MetadataSection to a collection of XML metadata represented by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: XML-metaadatok által képviselt gyűjteményét is hozzáadhat egy MetadataSection egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Much of the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metadata system, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient> class, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class to import or export service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Nagy részét a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metaadatok rendszer, például a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>osztály, használja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>osztály importálása és exportálása XML formában a szolgáltatás metaadatai.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeClient>

trans-unit.source: For example, to export [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] contract or endpoint objects to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object that contains the equivalent metadata in XML form, call the appropriate Export methods on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class, passing either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects, and then call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Például exportálása [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] szerződés vagy a végpont-objektumot egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektum, amely tartalmazza XML formában egyenértékű metaadatok hívható meg a megfelelő Export módszerek a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>osztály, átadja vagy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>vagy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>objektumokat, és majd hívja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A>metódus.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: To import XML-based metadata from a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object into [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> objects, pass a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object to the constructor of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> class and call one of the import methods.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-alapú metaadatok importálása egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>az objektum [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>, és <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>objektumok, adjon át egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>objektum konstruktorának a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>osztály, és hívja meg az importálási módszerek.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class with no dialect, identifier, or XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> osztály nem dialektus, azonosítója vagy XML-metaadatok.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> class using the specified dialect, identifier, and XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> osztály a megadott dialektus, azonosítóját és az XML-metaadatok.

trans-unit.source: Use the MetadataSection constructor to specify the metadata to be included in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, its dialect and its identifier.
trans-unit.target: A MetadataSection konstruktor Ezzel adhatja meg, a metaadatok ez szereplő <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, a dialektus és az azonosítója.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The metadata object must be serializable using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class so that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> object can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: A metaadat-objektum szerializálható használatával kell lennie a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>osztály, hogy a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>objektum törzsparaméter szerializálható.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If it is not serializable, an exception is thrown when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Ha nem szerializálható, a rendszer kivételt hoz létre, amikor az objektum szerializált.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> object for the `metadata` parameter if you want to include a reference to the metadata instead of the metadata itself.
trans-unit.target: Használja a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>vagy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>esetében a `metadata` paraméternek, ha szeretné maga a metaadatok helyett a metaadatok mutató hivatkozás.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>

trans-unit.source: The dialect of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok dialektus.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: The XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-metaadatok.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of XML attributes that you can use to add or remove attributes extensions to the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Egy gyűjteménye, amelyekkel hozzáadása vagy eltávolítása attribútumok a bővítmények számára, a metaadatok XML-attribútumok beolvasása.

trans-unit.source: Use the Attributes property to add or remove attribute extensions.
trans-unit.target: Az attribútumok tulajdonsággal hozzáadásához vagy eltávolításához attribútum bővítmények.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The dialect and identifier attributes are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A dialektus és azonosító attribútum nem szerepelnek ebben a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: The collection of XML attributes for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az attribútumok XML gyűjteménye a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett gyűjteménye üres.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified policy information.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> a megadott házirend-információit.

trans-unit.source: Use CreateFromPolicy method to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: CreateFromPolicy metódus használatával hozzon létre egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>a WS-Policy házirend-kifejezést.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> and the `identifier` is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>tulajdonsága <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>és a `identifier` hozzá van rendelve a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recommend identifier is the `wsp:Name` attribute for the policy expression.
trans-unit.target: Az ajánlott azonosítóját a `wsp:Name` attribútum a házirend-kifejezést.

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of a policy as defined in WS-Policy.
trans-unit.target: A WS-Policy házirend XML-ábrázolása.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the policy.
trans-unit.target: A házirend azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified policy expression with the specified identifier.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a megadott házirend-kifejezést a megadott azonosítóval.

trans-unit.source: The XML element is not a policy element.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-elem nem egy házirend-elem.

trans-unit.source: The policy is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A házirend <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> a megadott <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName> objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus statikus gyári segítségével gyorsan létrehozhat egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>XML-séma dokumentum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>tulajdonság értéke van hozzárendelve <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>és a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>tulajdonság értékét az XML-séma dokumentum célnévtere van hozzárendelve.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-séma dokumentum.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> containing the specified XML schema.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> tartalmazó a megadott XML-séma.

trans-unit.source: The schema is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A séma <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza egy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a megadott <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this static factory method to quickly create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus statikus gyári segítségével gyorsan létrehozhat egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>WSDL-dokumentum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A> property is assigned the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> property is assigned the value of the target namespace of the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>tulajdonság értéke van hozzárendelve <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>és a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A>tulajdonság a célnévtere a WSDL-dokumentum értéket kapja.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Identifier%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.Dialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> used to create a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> létrehozásához használt egy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a megadott <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serviceDescription is .
trans-unit.target: The serviceDescription is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja egy érték, amely a metaadatokat típusát jelöli.

trans-unit.source: The dialect indicates the type of metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: A dialektus metaadatok a ez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> típusát jelzi

trans-unit.source: The dialect strings with supported object models are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A>
trans-unit.target: A támogatott hálózatiobjektum-modelljei a dialektus karakterláncok:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.XmlSchemaDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.ServiceDescriptionDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.PolicyDialect%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection.MetadataExchangeDialect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dialect for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok dialektus.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a metaadatok azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata in this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok a ez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> azonosítója

trans-unit.source: The value depends on the type of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Az érték metaadatok típusától függ.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the metadata.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contained metadata object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a benne lévő metaadat-objektum.

trans-unit.source: Use the Metadata property to access or modify the metadata content contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.
trans-unit.target: A metaadat-tulajdonságnak segítségével fér hozzá, vagy módosítsa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> tárolt metaadatok tartalom

trans-unit.source: The metadata object can be <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> or a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> as a reference to the metadata content.
trans-unit.target: A metaadat-objektum lehet <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>vagy egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation>a metaadatok tartalom mutató hivatkozásként.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> is deserialized, the type of the metadata object is determined from the XML content.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>van deszerializálva, a metaadat-objektum típusa határozza meg az XML-tartalomban.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values.
trans-unit.target: A következő táblázat ismerteti a visszatérési érték.

trans-unit.source: |Type of XML metadata|Returned type| |--------------------------|-------------------| |WSDL document|<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| |XML Schema|<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata reference|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| |Metadata location|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| |Policy, and all other XML content|<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: | A metaadatok XML típusú |} Típusú értéket adott vissza |} |--------------------------|-------------------| | WSDL-dokumentum |} <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>| | XML-séma |} <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName>| | Metaadat-referencia |} <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName>| | Metaadatok helyét |} <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName>| | Házirend, és minden egyéb XML-tartalom |} <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataLocation?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The metadata contents for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok tartalma <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the metadata exchange dialect.
trans-unit.target: A metaadatok exchange dialektus értékét tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: A WS-metaadatok Exchange dokumentum dialektus.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Metadata Exchange document.
trans-unit.target: A WS-metaadatok Exchange dokumentum dialektus.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the WS-Policy dialect.
trans-unit.target: A WS-Policy dialektus értékét tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: A dialektus a WS-Policy házirend-kifejezést.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WS-Policy policy expression.
trans-unit.target: A dialektus a WS-Policy házirend-kifejezést.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dialect.
trans-unit.target: A Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dialektus értékét tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The dialect.
trans-unit.target: A dialektus.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: A WSDL-dokumentum dialektus.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value of the XML Schema dialect.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-séma dialektusa értékét tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-séma dokumentum dialektus.

trans-unit.source: The dialect for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-séma dokumentum dialektus.
